description:
Youzen reveals that he has only been monitoring Taikoubou all this time. Now, while Hakutsuru Doji (piloting the Hirai-i) takes on Taikoubou`s friends, Taikoubou himself must fight Youzen. Back on Earth, Kou Hiko stops some troops of the Yin Army from increasing tensions.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Taikoubou is Cornered in Gyokukyo Palace
Taikun est dans une situation désespérée
太公望, 玉虚宮に進退極まる
